### EZ976-222463 Re-tender: Life Safety Testing, System Repairs and Replacement Standing Offer Agreement (SOA)
#### Tender Number: 
WS3755274719-Doc3874595475
#### Tender Closing Date: March 9, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC), on behalf of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) and other government departments (OGD), invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for a Life Safety Testing, System Repairs and Replacement Standing Offer Agreement (SOA).

**Background and Purpose**
The SOA aims to provide life safety services, installations, alterations, testing, and repair work at facilities located throughout the Yukon Region. The estimated total dollar value of all Standing Offers is $1,575,000.00 (GST or HST included) for a period of two years, with the possibility of two irrevocable options to extend the term of the Standing Offer for two additional consecutive 12-month periods.

**Scope of Work**
The successful contractor will be responsible for the repair of fire alarm and detection systems, as well as other life safety services, installations, and repairs, as and when required, at facilities located throughout the Yukon Region.

**Contract Requirements**
- Up to [1] Standing Offers, each for a period of 2 years
- Irrevocable options to extend the term of the Standing Offer for 2 additional consecutive 12-month periods
- Estimated total dollar value: $1,575,000.00 (GST or HST included) for 2 years

**Standing Offer Award Criteria**
The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price methodology.

**Eligibility**
This tender is open to all contractors who meet the eligibility criteria specified in the tender documents.

**Contact Information**
For more information, please email Lam, Tian (SPAC/PSPC) at [adian Unspscqs]: [tian.lam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tian.lam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
